articles.title: Trump's Iowa spectacle clouds DeSantis as former president is joined by Florida officials
articles.description: However, he repeated during remarks to hundreds crammed into the fair favorite Steer and Stein the disproven claim that the 2020 election was rigged, and that we got millions and millions more votes.
